hints.content:
First, we have to find out how far Wings can blow fire.  The bar for Wings lines up with $\redC{210}$ on the scale.  


[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Dragon and the vertical axis labeled Fire Blowing Distance in centimeters. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Sparky, Spike, Flame, Blaze, and Wings. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows, 0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 210, 240, 270, 300 and 330. The bar line for each dragon shows the following: Sparky’s bar line extends to the 150, Spike’s bar line extends to the 270, Flame’s bar line extends to the 180, Blaze’s bar line extends to the 300, and Wings’ bar line extends to 210. A red line is drawn to the right from 210, which reaches to the end of Wings' bar line. !

hints.content: On the scale, all bars ending above $210$ show distances farther than $210$ centimeters.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Dragon and the vertical axis labeled Fire Blowing Distance in centimeters. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Sparky, Spike, Flame, Blaze, and Wings. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows, 0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 210, 240, 270, 300 and 330. The bar line for each dragon shows the following: Sparky’s bar line extends to the 150, Spike’s bar line extends to the 270, Flame’s bar line extends to the 180, Blaze’s bar line extends to the 300, and Wings’ bar line extends to 210. A red line is drawn to the right from 210, which reaches to the end of Wings' bar line. Spike’s bar and Blaze’s bar ending above the red line are highlighted. !

hints.content: Spike and Blaze can blow fire farther than Wings.

question.content:
Davi the dragon keeper  measured how far each of his dragons can blow fire.

[[☃ image 1]]

**Which of the following dragons can blow fire farther than Wings?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Dragon and the vertical axis labeled Fire Blowing Distance in centimeters. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Sparky, Spike, Flame, Blaze, and Wings. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows, 0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 210, 240, 270, 300 and 330. The bar line for each dragon shows the following: Sparky’s bar line extends to the 150, Spike’s bar line extends to the 270, Flame’s bar line extends to the 180, Blaze’s bar line extends to the 300, and Wings’ bar line extends to 210. !
